SECRET.
G.T.-361A
WAR CABINET.
THE URGENT NEED FOR A MILITARY OF HEALTH.
(Note by the Secretary.)
It is suggested for the consideration of the War Cabinet that the above Memorandum prepared by the President of the Local Government Board (Paper G.T. 361) should be referred, in the first instance, to a Committee, which might be composed as follows.-
Lord Milner.
Mr. Henderson
Lord Rhondda.
Sir E. Cornwall.
Dr. Addison.
Dr. Fisher.
Mr. Montagu.
to advise and report as to the necessary legislation with Mr. G.M. Young as Secretary.
(Initialled) M.P.A.H.
2 Whitehall Gardens, S.W.
April 4th, 1917.
